translations.tagline: A secure, fast, and feature-rich URL shortener, ye landlubber. âš¡
translations.long_url_placeholder: Heave yer long URL here, savvy?
translations.dashboard_tagline: Here be the log of yer plunder! All the links ye sent to sea.
translations.login_required: Where be yer Letter of Marque? ğŸ”‘
translations.enter_owner_id_prompt: Input yer captain's code to see yer treasure chest.
translations.about_section_mission_text_1: To pillage the web and bring back fast, safe links for all ye buccaneers.
translations.about_section_mission_text_2: We sail the high seas of the internet with speed and privacy.
translations.about_security_point_1: We check all cargo before loadin' (no bad links).
translations.about_security_point_2: Our sails be hardened against any scurvy attack.
translations.about_security_point_3: Yer links are sealed with a pirate's oath and secret token.
translations.error_creating_link: ğŸš¨ Shiver me timbers! That URL be leaky.
translations.link_expired: The grog has run out! ğŸ’€

translations.token_missing: Yer pirate credentials be needed! âŒ
